divs: sighting detailsone mile northwest of burns, oregon. i was on radar road at the skull creek road turn off. it was about 11:00pm. as i was driving i noticed a really bright light up in the sky to the west. then i thought i saw it move but when i looked right at it, it was totally still, so i figured i was just seeing things. then it moved again and i knew i saw it this time so i stopped the truck and got out. i would guess it was at about 1500-2000ft up and 3\4 of a mile away. for a second i thought that it must be a helicopter but that���s when i realized that it was dead quiet except for a few crickets. it kept moving and stopping. then it just started flying around in all directions. it was really smooth in its movements, and fast. then it flew in a zig zag like a sine wave, back and forth, and then disappeared. that floored me!i was standing there thinking about what i had just seen, when i saw the light come back on, just on the other side of the ridge of the hill 1\4 mi in front of me. i couldn���t see the object, but i could see it glowing behind the brush. then it came over the hill just a few feet off the ground and went down the side of the hill towards me and to the right. it was just above the brush and i could see the reflection of the light on the ground, as the thing came down the hill. i could see that it went behind a juniper tree and didn't come out the other side. it was just a pure white ball of light maybe a little bigger than a basketball. i had seen three orange lights a few months earlier,and they also flew around in a similar manner. it was an amazing experience, and one i was sure i'd never have again. so when i realized that this light was actually moving, and stopped the truck, i was thinking "you're kidding me. again?". because i had seen those others, this time i wasn't in that same state of confusion and excitement at what i was seeing. i was completely calm, so i was able to just enjoy what i was seeing. it moved so amazingly, and gracefully, and at the risk of sounding odd, playfully. when it did its zig-zag move i was stunned.
Summary: White light zig-zags in sky then flies along ground
